sentences.en: 'Did you ever see a counterfeit of timidity, Mr. Lorry?'
sentences.cn: “ 你看见过假装胆小怕事的么, 罗瑞先生? ”
这种胆怯又一次错位了.

sentences.en: An impulse of feeling now overcame her timidity, and Hetty spoke.
sentences.cn: 一阵感情激动冲破了羞怯, 海蒂终于说话了.

sentences.en: Anyone who does otherwise, either out of timidity or because of bad advice, is always obliged to keep his knife in his hand.
sentences.cn: 任何不这样做的人，或出于胆怯，或由于接受了拙劣的建议，总是被迫一直把屠刀提在手中。

sentences.en: Besides , you could hardly accuse Mr Obama of timidity.
sentences.cn: 此外，你也不能指责奥巴马胆怯。

sentences.en: By this time Emil had lost all his timidity.
sentences.cn: 这时,爱弥儿变得一点也不拘束了.
我终于克服了畏怯心理.

sentences.en: He had a terrible time in overcoming his timidity.
sentences.cn: 他费了很大的劲才克服了他的胆怯.

sentences.en: He had been fooled , faked out, by the Five Families and their seeming timidity.
sentences.cn: 他受骗了,上当了, 被五大家族胆小怕事的外表迷住了心窍.

sentences.en: He shows an almost childlike timidity in talking with strangers.
sentences.cn: 他和生人谈话简直像小孩子一样面嫩.

sentences.en: He was not at ease with me, and much of his bluster rose from timidity.
sentences.cn: 和我在一起他就不自在, 他的吵嚷大都是由于怯懦.

sentences.en: His failure is largely due to timidity.
sentences.cn: 他的失败主要是由于胆小.

sentences.en: In this, the politicians display not only their own timidity but also the mood of many voters.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上，政要们不仅展现他们的胆小，还有许多民众的不满情绪。

sentences.en: Much of his bluster rose from timidity.
sentences.cn: 他的吵嚷大都是由于怯懦.

sentences.en: Wang shows an almost childlike timidity in talking with strangers.
sentences.cn: 王和生人谈话简直像小孩子般地羞怯.
